issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: I noticed during import task churn tests (import task + rinse and repeat 1 task at a time) that some tasks were failing due to workers competing for the same task. This test is being run on a multi-cluster topo with 3 workers. This seems to occur with more than 1 worker in the same zone. See aggregated log below where two instances/workers in the same zone compete for volume attachment. Result is the task fails. Thanks, -Matt {code} [root@c-19 eucalyptus]# euca-describe-conversion-tasks import-i-a9dc4c27 TaskType IMPORTINSTANCE TaskId import-i-a9dc4c27 ExpirationTime Thu May 22 22:30:35 PDT 2014 Status cancelled StatusMessage Image conversion failed DISKIMAGE DiskImageFormat RAW DiskImageSize 41126400 VolumeId vol-8230e57b VolumeSize 1 AvailabilityZone PARTI00 ApproximateBytesConverted Status active fields.summary: Imaging workers competing for tasks, causing task failure

comments.body: Ran 6 imaging workers and submitted 30 import-volume tasks. Confirmed all tasks were completed.
verified with multiple workers and tasks in the same zone
